    • setupCountryCombo

      protected void setupCountryCombo()
      Sets up the country combo box with all countries from the database.

    • changeCountryFilter

      protected void changeCountryFilter()
      Changes the divisions displayed in the division combo box based on the selected country. LAMBDA Expression.

    • initializeCustomerForm

      protected void initializeCustomerForm()
      Initializes the customer form by clearing all fields and selections.

    • customerErrorHandling

      protected void customerErrorHandling()
      Handles any errors in the customer form by checking if all fields are filled in. Appends error messages to a StringBuilder if any fields are empty. I reused this logic from my Software I project, which linked to a logicCheck. I modified it here and included some logic here and in the save method.

    • displayErrors

      private void displayErrors(StringBuilder errorMessage)
      Displays an alert message with the error messages from the StringBuilder if it is not empty.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The StringBuilder containing the error messages.

    • saveCustomerButton

      private void saveCustomerButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Saves the customer to the database if there are no errors. Initializes the customer form and returns back to the previous scene. Customer ID set to 0 as database automatically generates ID and increments.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the previous scene file is not found.

    • addAppointmentButton

      private void addAppointmentButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the 'Add Appointment' button is clicked. Loads the 'appointment-add.fxml' scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file 'appointment-add.fxml' is not found.
